channel.title: Book-length projects on A. Solomon Kurz
channel.description: Recent content in Book-length projects on A. Solomon Kurz

item.title: Book-length projects
item.description: Statistical Rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse I love Richard McElreath’s Statistical Rethinking. It’s the introductory textbook to Bayesian statistics I looked a couple years, for. However, I’ve come to prefer using Paul Bürkner’s brms package when doing Bayesian regression in R. So, this project is an attempt to re-express the code in McElreath’s textbook. All the models are re-fit in brms. In addition, I also show how to wrangle the data in the tidyverse style and make the plots with ggplot2.
